meta.name: description
meta.content: Our staff is remarkable! They spend countless hours making sure that each and every student is achieving at his or her highest potential and they demonstrate, over and over again, the willingness to go the extra mile. Please come in and visit our schools, both virtually and in person. Education is a very personal experience. You can truly gain an understanding of how much we care about every childâ€™s education by observing our staff and students first hand.

div.strong: This plan for addressing any Coronavirus incident is intended to serve the best interests of students, employees and families.Â

br.br:
Â
VIEW THE COVID-19 RESPONSE PLAN
VIEW THE COVID-19 RESPONSE PLAN

div.span: What Every Kid Needs to Know about COVID-19

div.br:
This 1 hour webinar is designed for elementary, middle, and high school children, their parents/guardians, teachers, counselors, school administrators, and anyone who is interested in getting information on the novel coronavirus or COVID-19. The webinar will use medically accurate and age appropriate content for 5-13 year olds. The content will focus on basic facts related to the science and public health along with frequently asked questions about how the coronavirus impacts things that matter to children like their friends, pets, vacations, etc. Webinar log in details will be sent 1 day before the webinar.
RELIABLE SOURCE:Â https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/children.html

strong.em: Redwood Area Schools have high expectations for all students to learn, achieve and to be productive citizens.
The purpose of this organization is to prepare our students to be college and career ready!
